en-CA.summary: Ask Alexa for quotes from the Infinity Engine games
examplePhrases: Alexa ask Infinity Quotes to tell me something from Baldur's Gate 1
Alexa ask Infinity Quotes to say something from Baldur's Gate 2
Alexa ask Infinity Quotes to give me a quote from Icewind Dale
en-CA.name: Infinity Quotes
en-CA.description:
Ask Alexa to give you random quotes from the entire text corpus shipped with:
Baldur's Gate
Baldur's Gate 2
Icewind Dale
Planescape Torment

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
"Alexa ask Infinity Quotes to tell me something"
No other special instructions, no money involved, no advertising, no credentials, no permissions, calls an external API to retrieve the quote information. The skill icons is 
CC Attribution-Noncommercial-No Derivate 4.0 from https://iconarchive.com/show/mega-games-pack-25-icons-by-3xhumed/Baldur-s-Gate-1-icon.html.
